title: Transcranial magnetic stimulation of the right inferior frontal gyrus impairs bilinguals' performance in language-switching tasks
content:
Publication date: January 2025

Source: Cognition, Volume 254

Author(s): Junjie Wu, Yannan Ji, Hongfu Qu, Shuyue Zuo, Jinsong Liang, Juan Su, Qiping Wang, Guoli Yan, Guosheng Ding
